headline: A Look At Crown Castle (CCI) Valuation As Fiber Sale And 2026 Net Loss Guidance Reshape The Story
summary: Crown Castle (CCI) is back in focus after its fourth quarter and 2025 results landed alongside plans to sell its fiber and small cell businesses, cut about 20% of staff, and refocus its capital allocation strategy. See our latest analysis for Crown Castle. The recent plan to sell fiber and small cell assets, together with cost cuts and guidance for a 2026 net loss, has arrived after a weaker patch in trading. The 90 day share price return of 9.75% and 1 year total shareholder return of 2.55%...
